title: Angels Among Us
overview:
This uplifting hour-long series presents compelling firsthand accounts of
 life-and- death situations with carefully crafted re-creations, to 
bring viewers a one-of-a-kind look at the world of angel encounters.

Each episode will conclude with a follow-up to find out just how these 
people been impacted, where they are today and how they've applied the 
lessons they've learned to their current lives.
